Detailed Description

Provider for settings of the Basic-MMI SMS application.
Provider ID: c_sms_settings_provider_id

The following columns are available:
IDTypeDescription
c_mmisms_line2_voicebox_address PhoneNumberType Sets or Gets voice mailbox number for Line2 (PhoneNumber type)
c_mmisms_pred_input NumberType En- or disables the request of pred input. (BOOLEAN type)
c_mmisms_default_profile NumberType Id (row in SmsParamProvider) of the selected default profile.
c_mmisms_voicebox_address PhoneNumberType Sets or Gets voice mailbox number for Line1 (PhoneNumber type)
c_mmisms_reply_path NumberType En- or disables the request of reply path. (BOOLEAN type)
c_mmisms_statusreport NumberType En- or disables the request of a status report. (BOOLEAN type)
c_mmisms_statusreport_on_idlescreenNumberType En- or disables the immediate display of status reports on idle screen. (BOOLEAN type)
c_mmisms_use_gprs_link NumberType GsmService value which is used for connection for Mo-Sms. (GsmService type)
c_mmisms_autostore_sending NumberType En- or disables storeing SMS automatically after sending. (BOOLEAN type)
c_mmisms_mandatory_preview NumberType En- or disables the preview of a SMS before sending it in any case. (BOOLEAN type)
c_mmisms_sending_confirmation NumberType En- or disables the sending confiramtion dialog. (BOOLEAN type)
c_mmisms_inbox_sorting NumberType Column Id for sorting the inbox.
c_mmisms_outbox_sorting NumberType Column Id for sorting the outbox.
c_mmisms_archive_sorting NumberType Column Id for sorting the archive box.
c_mmisms_statusreport_sorting NumberType Column Id for sorting the status report box.
c_mmisms_inbox_sorting_order NumberType Sorting order for the inbox. (BOOLEAN type; TRUE: Ascending, FALSE: Descending)
c_mmisms_outbox_sorting_order NumberType Sorting method for the outbox. (BOOLEAN type; TRUE: Ascending, FALSE: Descending)
c_mmisms_archive_sorting_order NumberType Sorting method for the archive box. (BOOLEAN type; TRUE: Ascending, FALSE: Descending)
c_mmisms_statusreport_sorting_orderNumberType Sorting method for the status report box. (BOOLEAN type; TRUE: Ascending, FALSE: Descending)
c_mmisms_storage_location NumberType Preferred Storage for storing SMS messages SmsSimPreferred or SmsFlashPreferred. (BOOLEAN type; TRUE: Ascending, FALSE: Descending)

BOOLEAN SmsSettingsProvider::GetDataItem (  INT  columnid,
INT  row,
DataItem &  item
)  [virtual]
 

Method reads a certain SMS provider data item.

Parameters:
columnid Provider column identifier to determine the data field that should be read.
row Provider row identifier.
item Pointer to data item. The read data will be saved in this structure.
Returns:
Method returns TRUE if all parameter values are valid and the several provider settings could be read without any errors.

void SmsSettingsProvider::Init (   ) 
 

Class initialisation; File with saved SMS settings will be read from FFS. If no file is existing a new file will be created.

BOOLEAN SmsSettingsProvider::SetDataItem (  const DataItem &  item,
INT  columnid
)  [virtual]
 

Method saves SMS provider data field settings in file.

Parameters:
item Pointer to data item. Data item with current data that should be stored in a file.
columnid Provider column identifier to determine the data field that should be replaced.
Returns:

BOOLEAN SmsSettingsProvider::Update (  ProviderListener *  listener = 0  )  [virtual]
 

Method makes the Provider ready to use, enables listener and reloads the SMS provider data from FFS.

Parameters:
listener Pointer to ProviderListener. Necessary to see the progress state from the calling application.
Returns:
Method returns always TRUE yet.

Reimplemented from SettingsProvider.
